name: Huabing Xie

timeline.event: Released on order of recognizance after initial arrest
Detained at Imperial Regional Detention Facility
ICE missed congressionally-mandated 90-day deadline to release death report

discrepancies.ice_claim: Death report to be released per congressional mandate
discrepancies.counter_evidence: ICE missed the congressionally-mandated 90-day deadline to release the death report

sources.title: ICE misses deadline to release report on in-custody death in Imperial County

notes: Age unknown at time of documentation. ICE failed to comply with congressionally-mandated reporting deadline.
